page.title: 10Area Sports
page.content: On Wednesday 19th June 1985 seven Plympton Primary schools gathered together for the area sports. These were held at the Ridgeway Comprehensive School. The new Lord Mayor presented the prizes for the winning schools. For the first time in four years Glen Park Primary School was presented with a cup. The schools taking part were: Old Priory, Boringdon, Plympton St Maurice, Woodford, Chaddlewood, Glen Park and Yealmpstone Farm. Among the races were the obstacle race and flat race. Old Priory came first, Chaddlewood second and Glen Park third. The children of Glen Park were delighted to come third. The spectators gave a lot of support and kept the runners going. It was an exciting and enjoyable day.
